title: O'bean Organic Soya Store - Tanjong Pagar
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Ovo, Chinese, Japanese, Fast food, Take-out
description: Moved here Dec 2015 from 83 Tanjong Pagar Rd. O'bean operates several outlets. Offers soy broth soups, ramen, porridge, and other quick meals alongside desserts like bean curd and tang yuan (glutinous rice balls in sweet soup). The mock meatballs a few other items contain egg - ask. Sells soymilk powder for take home.
